mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(oi.id) FROM OrderItem oi WHERE 1=1

sql.if: AND oi.order_id IN (SELECT id FROM orders WHEREW payment_sn=#{queryOrder.paymentSn})
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM product_sku_stock_summary WHERE sku_id=oi.product_sku_id and sf_stock > 0)
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM product_sku_stock_summary WHERE sku_id=oi.product_sku_id and sf_stock = 0)
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM product_sku_stock_summary WHERE sku_id=oi.product_sku_id and st_stock > 0)
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM product_sku_stock_summary WHERE sku_id=oi.product_sku_id and st_stock = 0)
AND oi.status IN ('SUCCESS','SIGNED') AND comment_id is NOT NULL
AND oi.status IN ('SUCCESS','SIGNED') AND comment_id is NULL
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM p_brand WHERE id=oi.designer_id AND operation = #{queryOrder.operation})
AND (`sign_date` IS NULL AND `reship_id` IS NOT NULL AND `payment_type`=3 AND `status`='AFTERCLOSE')
AND oi.refund_id IS NOT NULL AND oi.reship_id IS NULL
AND oi.reship_id IS NOT NULL AND oi.refund_id IS NULL
AND oi.refund_id IS NOT NULL AND oi.reship_id IS NOT NULL

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM OrderItem WHERE order_id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM OrderItem WHERE order_sn = #{orderSn}
SELECT * FROM OrderItem WHERE refund_id = #{refundId} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE order_sn=#{orderSn} AND delivery_bar_code=#{barCode} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE delivery_sn=#{deliverySn}
SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE status='DELIVERED' AND delivery_time<=DATE_SUB(#{date},INTERVAL #{interval} DAY)
SELECT count(id) FROM orderItem WHERE status='DELIVERED' AND delivery_time<=DATE_SUB(#{date},INTERVAL #{interval} DAY)
SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE status='SIGNED' AND expect_date <= NOW()
SELECT count(id) FROM orderItem WHERE status='SIGNED' AND expect_date <= NOW()

SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('DELIVERED','SIGNED','SUCCESS','AFTERCLOSE') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),delivery_time) >= 1 AND DATEDIFF(delivery_time,#{beginDate}) >= 0 AND payment_type!=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM p_product WHERE product_sale_type in('CONSIGN','COOPERATIVE') AND product_trade_type='COMMON' and source='D2CMALL' AND orderitem.product_id = p_product.id) LIMIT #{page.startNumber},#{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('DELIVERED','SIGNED','SUCCESS','AFTERCLOSE') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),delivery_time) >= 1 AND DATEDIFF(delivery_time,#{beginDate}) >= 0 AND payment_type!=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM p_product WHERE product_sale_type in('CONSIGN','COOPERATIVE') AND product_trade_type='COMMON' and source='D2CMALL' AND orderitem.product_id = p_product.id)

SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('DELIVERED','SIGNED','SUCCESS','AFTERCLOSE') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),balance_date) >= 1 AND DATEDIFF(balance_date,#{beginDate}) >= 0 AND payment_type=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM p_product WHERE product_sale_type in('CONSIGN','COOPERATIVE') AND product_trade_type='COMMON' and source='D2CMALL' AND orderitem.product_id = p_product.id) LIMIT #{page.startNumber},#{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('DELIVERED','SIGNED','SUCCESS','AFTERCLOSE') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),balance_date) >= 1 AND DATEDIFF(balance_date,#{beginDate}) >= 0 AND payment_type=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM p_product WHERE product_sale_type in('CONSIGN','COOPERATIVE') AND product_trade_type='COMMON' and source='D2CMALL' AND orderitem.product_id = p_product.id)

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT oi.product_sku_id FROM orderItem oi, p_product_sku s, p_brand d WHERE oi.product_sku_id=s.id AND oi.designer_id=d.id AND oi.status NOT IN('MALLCLOSE', 'AFTERCLOSE', 'CLOSE', 'INIT')
GROUP BY oi.product_sku_id)t

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT oi.product_sku_id FROM orderItem oi, p_brand d WHERE oi.designer_id=d.id AND oi.status NOT IN('MALLCLOSE', 'AFTERCLOSE', 'CLOSE', 'INIT')
GROUP BY oi.designer_id) t

SELECT orderitem.buyer_member_id, login_code, IFNULL(orderitem.estimate_date, orders.payment_time) AS estimate_date, orderitem.order_sn, orderitem.product_name, requisition FROM orderItem LEFT JOIN orders ON orderitem.order_id=orders.id WHERE orderItem.`status`='NORMAL'
SELECT count(*) FROM orderItem LEFT JOIN orders ON orderitem.order_id=orders.id WHERE orderItem.`status`='NORMAL'

SELECT product_id AS id, SUM(product_quantity) AS count FROM orderItem WHERE YEAR(modify_date)=YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(modify_date)=MONTH(NOW()) AND DAY(modify_date)=DAY(NOW())-1 AND status NOT IN('MALLCLOSE','CLOSE') GROUP BY product_id

SELECT SUM(product_quantity) as sales, designer_id as brandId FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('NORMAL','DELIVERED','SIGNED','AFTERCLOSE','SUCCESS') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_date) <=#{days} GROUP BY designer_id LIMIT #{pager.startNumber},#{pager.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM(SELECT designer_id FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('NORMAL','DELIVERED','SIGNED','AFTERCLOSE','SUCCESS') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_date) <=#{days} GROUP BY designer_id)T
SELECT product_id FROM orderItem WHERE buyer_member_id=#{buyerId} AND status NOT IN('MALLCLOSE', 'AFTERCLOSE', 'CLOSE', 'INIT')

SELECT buyer_member_id AS memberId, SUM(product_price*product_quantity -coupon_amount-promotion_amount-order_promotion_amount-red_amount) AS amount FROM orderItem WHERE `status`='SUCCESS' AND DATEDIFF(finish_date,NOW()) = 0 GROUP BY buyer_member_id LIMIT #{page.startNumber},#{page.pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE `status`='SUCCESS' AND DATEDIFF(finish_date,NOW()) = 0 GROUP BY buyer_member_id) t
SELECT product_id FROM orderItem WHERE payment_time > date_sub(NOW(),interval 1 day) GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY payment_time DESC LIMIT #{pager.startNumber},#{pager.pageSize}

SELECT product_id AS productId, sum(product_quantity) AS sales FROM orderItem WHERE payment_time > date_sub(NOW(),interval #{month} MONTH) GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY sales DESC LIMIT #{pager.startNumber},#{pager.pageSize}

SELECT SUM(product_quantity) as sales, product_id as productId FROM orderItem WHERE partner_id IS not NULL AND orderItem.`status` IN('NORMAL','DELIVERED','SIGNED','AFTERCLOSE','SUCCESS') AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),create_date) <=#{days} GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY SUM(product_quantity) DESC LIMIT #{pager.startNumber},#{pager.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT SUM(product_price*product_quantity -coupon_amount-order_promotion_amount-promotion_amount-red_amount) AS total, buyer_member_id AS memerId FROM orderItem WHERE `status`='SUCCESS' GROUP BY buyer_member_id)t WHERE total >=#{money}

SELECT `status`, COUNT(*) counts FROM orderItem WHERE 1 = 1
AND store_id IS NOT NULL
AND store_id =#{storeId}
GROUP BY `status` ORDER BY `status` ASC
SELECT status, count(*) as counts FROM OrderItem WHERE buyer_member_id=#{memberInfoId} GROUP BY status
SELECT count(*) FROM OrderItem WHERE product_sku_id = #{id}
SELECT count(DISTINCT(`buyer_member_id`)) FROM `orderitem` WHERE `status`='SUCCESS'
SELECT count(*) FROM orderItem WHERE (status='SUCCESS' OR status='SIGNED') AND buyer_member_id=#{memberInfoId} AND comment_id IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE OrderItem SET refund_id = #{refundId}, modify_date = now() WHERE id = #{orderItemId} AND refund_id IS NULL
UPDATE OrderItem SET reship_id = #{reshipId}, modify_date = now() WHERE id = #{orderItemId} AND reship_id IS NULL
UPDATE OrderItem SET exchange_id = #{exchangeId}, modify_date = now() WHERE id = #{orderItemId} AND exchange_id IS NULL

UPDATE OrderItem SET refund_id = #{refundId}, modify_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
AND (SELECT count(id) FROM o_order_refund WHERE refund_status>=0 AND order_item_id=#{id}) <= 1
UPDATE OrderItem SET reship_id = #{reshipId}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET exchange_id = #{exchangeId}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET requisition=#{requisition}, modify_date =now() WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET status=#{status}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET bus_type=#{busType}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE OrderItem SET collage_status=#{status}, modify_date =now() WHERE
order_sn IN
#{item}
order_sn = 0
UPDATE OrderItem SET estimate_date=#{estimateDate}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET expect_date=#{expectDate}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET coupon_amount=#{couponAmount}, modify_date =now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET item_close_reason=#{itemCloseReason}, item_close_man=#{itemCloseMan}, item_close_time=now(), modify_date =now(), status='CLOSE' WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND status='NORMAL'

UPDATE OrderItem
delivery_corp_name=#{deliveryCorpName},
delivery_sn=#{deliverySn},
delivery_bar_code=#{deliveryBarCode},
modify_date =now()
WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE orderItem SET balance_money=#{balanceMoney}, balance_reason=#{balanceReason}, balance_date=now(), balance_man=#{balanceMan}, modify_date=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}

UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date=now(), status='NORMAL', payment_type=#{paymentType}, pop=#{pop}, payment_time=NOW(), cash_amount=#{cashAmount}, gift_amount=#{giftAmount}, estimate_date=#{estimateDate} WHERE id = #{id} AND (status='INIT' or status='NORMAL')

UPDATE OrderItem
delivery_type=#{deliveryType},
delivery_corp_name=#{deliveryCorpName},
delivery_sn=#{deliverySn},
delivery_bar_code=#{deliveryBarCode},
delivery_quantity=#{deliveryQuantity},
status='DELIVERED', delivery_time=now(), modify_date =now()
WHERE id = #{orderItemId} AND (status='NORMAL' OR status='WAITDELIVERED')
UPDATE OrderItem SET delivery_type=#{deliveryType} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date=now(), status='SIGNED', sign_date=#{signDate}, expect_date=#{expectDate} WHERE id=#{id} AND (status='DELIVERED' OR status='NORMAL')
UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date=now(), status='SUCCESS', finish_date=now(), diff_amount=#{diffAmount} WHERE id = #{id} AND (status='SUCCESS' OR status='SIGNED' OR status='DELIVERED')

UPDATE orderItem oi SET oi.modify_date =now(), oi.`status`='SUCCESS', oi.finish_date=now() WHERE oi.status='SIGNED' AND oi.sign_date IS NOT NULL AND oi.sign_date < date_add(now(), interval-#{expireTime} second) AND oi.id NOT IN (SELECT order_item_id FROM o_order_refund WHERE refund_status < 8 AND refund_status >= 0)
UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date=now(), locked=1, item_memo=#{info} WHERE id=#{id} AND status NOT IN ('DELIVERED','SUCCESS') AND locked=0
UPDATE OrderItem SET item_close_reason=#{itemCloseReason},item_close_man=#{itemCloseMan},item_close_time=now(), modify_date =now(), status=#{status}, collage_status=-1 WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE orderItem SET balance=1, balance_man=#{balanceMan}, balance_date=now(), balance_reason=#{balanceReason}, balance_money=#{balanceMoney}, bill_number=#{billNumber}, modify_date=NOW() WHERE id=#{id} AND status IN ('DELIVERED','SIGNED','AFTERCLOSE','SUCCESS')
UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date =now(), status='NORMAL' WHERE id = #{id} AND (status='MALLCLOSE' or status='CLOSE')
UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date=now(),status='NORMAL',store_id=null,bind_date=null,item_memo=null,cod_amount=null,locked=0 WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE OrderItem SET modify_date=now(),locked=0,item_memo=#{info} WHERE id=#{id} AND locked=1
UPDATE orderItem SET balance=0,modify_date=NOW() WHERE id=#{id} AND status = 'DELIVERED'

UPDATE OrderItem
status='NORMAL',modify_date=now(), delivery_corp_name=null,delivery_sn=null,delivery_time=null
WHERE id = #{id} and status='DELIVERED'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM orderItem WHERE product_source='CAOMEI' AND `status`='DELIVERED' AND delivery_sn LIKE 'SN%'

SELECT * FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('DELIVERED','SIGNED','SUCCESS','AFTERCLOSE') AND bus_type='DPLUS' AND delivery_time IS NULL AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),sign_date) >= 1 AND DATEDIFF(sign_date,#{beginDate}) >= 0 AND payment_type!=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM p_product WHERE product_sale_type in('CONSIGN','COOPERATIVE') AND product_trade_type='COMMON' and source='D2CMALL' AND orderitem.product_id = p_product.id) LIMIT #{page.startNumber},#{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM orderItem WHERE orderItem.`status` IN('DELIVERED','SIGNED','SUCCESS','AFTERCLOSE') AND bus_type='DPLUS' AND delivery_time IS NULL AND DATEDIFF(NOW(),sign_date) >= 1 AND DATEDIFF(sign_date,#{beginDate}) >= 0 AND payment_type!=3 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM p_product WHERE product_sale_type in('CONSIGN','COOPERATIVE') AND product_trade_type='COMMON' and source='D2CMALL' AND orderitem.product_id = p_product.id)
